org.itemscript.core.gwt
Class RequestUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.core.gwt.RequestUtils

public class RequestUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class assists in the creation and use of GWT Requests.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

sendGetRequest

public static com.google.gwt.http.client.Request sendGetRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                                                com.google.gwt.http.client.RequestCallback callback)
Send a GET request without specifying parameters, or with parameters already encoded in the query string.

Parameters:
url - The URL to GET (with or without query string).
callback - The callback to call when the GET request completes.
Returns:
The Request object for this request.

sendJsonGetRequest

public static com.google.gwt.http.client.Request sendJsonGetRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                                                    JsonValue json,
                                                                    com.google.gwt.http.client.RequestCallback callback)
Send a GET request with a JSON payload in the query string.

Parameters:
url - The base URL to GET (without a query string).
json - The JSON to send in the query string.
callback - The callback to call when the GET request completes.
Returns:
The Request object for this request.

Send a POST request with a JSON payload.

Parameters:
url - The URL to POST to.
json - The JSON to send in the POST request.
callback - The callback to call when the POST request completes.
Returns:
The Request object for this request.

Parameters:

sendPostRequest

public static com.google.gwt.http.client.Request sendPostRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                                                 JsonObject params,
                                                                 com.google.gwt.http.client.RequestCallback callback)
Send a standard POST request. The parameters will be encoded as application/x-www-form-urlencoded.

Parameters:
url - The URL to POST to.
params - The query parameters.
callback - The callback to call when the POST request completes.
Returns:
The Request object for this request.
